00085     inline std::pair<size_t, size_t> commonGet ( size_t first, size_t second, size_t third, size_t fourth ) const {
00086         const size_t idx[] = {first, second, third, fourth};
00087         LOG_IF( ! clean, Debug, error )
00088                 << "Getting data from a non indexed image will result in undefined behavior. Run reIndex first.";
00089         LOG_IF( set.isEmpty(), Debug, error )
00090                 << "Getting data from a empty image will result in undefined behavior.";
00091         LOG_IF( !isInRange( idx ), Debug, isis::error )
00092                 << "Index " << util::listToString( idx, idx + 4, "|" ) << " is out of range (" << getSizeAsString() << ")";
00093         const size_t index = getLinearIndex( idx );
00094         return std::make_pair( index / chunkVolume, index % chunkVolume );
00095     }

00150     template<typename T> Image( std::list<T> &chunks, dimensions min_dim = rowDim ) :
00151         _internal::NDimensional<4>(), util::PropertyMap(), minIndexingDim( min_dim ),
00152         set( "sequenceNumber,rowVec,columnVec,sliceVec,coilChannelMask,DICOM/EchoNumbers" ),
00153         clean( false ) {
00154         addNeededFromString( neededProperties );
00155         set.addSecondarySort( "acquisitionNumber" );
00156         set.addSecondarySort( "acquisitionTime" );
00157         insertChunksFromContainer( chunks );
00158     }
00163     template<typename T> Image( std::vector<T> &chunks, dimensions min_dim = rowDim ) :
00164         _internal::NDimensional<4>(), util::PropertyMap(),
00165         set( "sequenceNumber,rowVec,columnVec,sliceVec,coilChannelMask,DICOM/EchoNumbers" ),
00166         clean( false ), minIndexingDim( min_dim ) {
00167         addNeededFromString( neededProperties );
00168         set.addSecondarySort( "acquisitionNumber" );
00169         set.addSecondarySort( "acquisitionTime" );
00170         insertChunksFromContainer( chunks );
00171     }

00178     template<typename T> size_t insertChunksFromContainer( T &chunks ) {
00179         BOOST_STATIC_ASSERT( ( boost::is_base_of<Chunk, typename T::value_type >::value ) );
00180         size_t cnt = 0;
00181 
00182         for ( typename T::iterator i = chunks.begin(); i != chunks.end(); ) { // for all remaining chunks
00183             if ( insertChunk( *i ) ) {
00184                 chunks.erase( i++ );
00185                 cnt++;
00186             } else {
00187                 i++;
00188             }
00189         }
00190 
00191         if ( ! isEmpty() ) {
00192             LOG( Debug, info ) << "Reindexing image with " << cnt << " chunks.";
00193 
00194             if( !reIndex() ) {
00195                 LOG( Runtime, error ) << "Failed to create image from " << cnt << " chunks.";
00196             } else {
00197                 LOG_IF( !getMissing().empty(), Debug, warning )
00198                         << "The created image is missing some properties: " << getMissing() << ". It will be invalid.";
00199             }
00200         } else {
00201             LOG( Debug, warning ) << "Image is empty after inserting chunks.";
00202         }
00203 
00204         return cnt;
00205     }

00220     bool isClean()const;
00238     template <typename T> T &voxel( size_t first, size_t second = 0, size_t third = 0, size_t fourth = 0 ) {
00239         checkMakeClean();
00240         const std::pair<size_t, size_t> index = commonGet( first, second, third, fourth );
00241         ValuePtr<T> &data = chunkAt( index.first ).asValuePtr<T>();
00242         return data[index.second];
00243     }
00244 
00257     template <typename T> const T &voxel( size_t first, size_t second = 0, size_t third = 0, size_t fourth = 0 )const {
00258         const std::pair<size_t, size_t> index = commonGet( first, second, third, fourth );
00259         const ValuePtr<T> &data = chunkPtrAt( index.first )->getValuePtr<T>();
00260         return data[index.second];
00261     }

00327     template<typename TYPE> Chunk getChunkAs( size_t first, size_t second = 0, size_t third = 0, size_t fourth = 0, bool copy_metadata = true )const {
00328         return getChunkAs<TYPE>( getScalingTo( ValuePtr<TYPE>::staticID ), first, second, third, fourth, copy_metadata );
00329     }
00342     template<typename TYPE> Chunk getChunkAs( const scaling_pair &scaling, size_t first, size_t second = 0, size_t third = 0, size_t fourth = 0, bool copy_metadata = true )const {
00343         Chunk ret = getChunk( first, second, third, fourth, copy_metadata ); // get a cheap copy
00344         ret.convertToType( ValuePtr<TYPE>::staticID, scaling ); // make it of type T
00345         return ret; //return that
00346     }

00386     template<typename T> std::pair<T, T> getMinMaxAs()const {
00387         util::checkType<T>();// works only for T from _internal::types
00388         std::pair<util::ValueReference, util::ValueReference> minmax = getMinMax();
00389         return std::make_pair( minmax.first->as<T>(), minmax.second->as<T>() );
00390     }

00420     bool transformCoords( boost::numeric::ublas::matrix<float> transform_matrix, bool transformCenterIsImageCenter = false ) {
00421 
00422         BOOST_FOREACH( std::vector<boost::shared_ptr< data::Chunk> >::reference chRef, lookup ) {
00423             if( !chRef->transformCoords( transform_matrix, transformCenterIsImageCenter ) ) {
00424                 return false;
00425             }
00426         }
00427 
00428         if( !isis::data::_internal::transformCoords( *this, getSizeAsVector(), transform_matrix, transformCenterIsImageCenter ) ) {
00429             LOG( Runtime, error ) << "Error during transforming the coords of the image.";
00430             return false;
00431         }
00432 
00433         if( !updateOrientationMatrices() ) {
00434             LOG( Runtime, error ) << "Could not update the orientation matrices of the image!";
00435             return false;
00436         }
00437 
00438         return true;
00439     }

00477     template<typename T> void copyToMem( T *dst )const {
00478         if( clean ) {
00479             scaling_pair scale = getScalingTo( ValuePtr<T>::staticID );
00480             // we could do this using convertToType - but this solution does not need any additional temporary memory
00481             BOOST_FOREACH( const boost::shared_ptr<Chunk> &ref, lookup ) {
00482                 if( !ref->copyToMem<T>( dst, scale ) ) {
00483                     LOG( Runtime, error ) << "Failed to copy raw data of type " << ref->getTypeName() << " from image into memory of type " << ValuePtr<T>::staticName();
00484                 }
00485 
00486                 dst += ref->getVolume(); // increment the cursor
00487             }
00488         } else {
00489             LOG( Runtime, error ) << "Cannot copy from non clean images. Run reIndex first";
00490         }
00491     }
00492 
00499     template<typename T> MemChunk<T> copyToMemChunk()const {
00500         const util::FixedVector<size_t, 4> size = getSizeAsVector();
00501         data::MemChunk<T> ret( size[0], size[1], size[2], size[3] );
00502         copyToMem<T>( &ret.voxel<T>( 0, 0, 0, 0 ) );
00503         return ret;
00504     }
00505     template<typename OutputIterator> void copyChunksTo( OutputIterator result, bool copy_metadata = false )const {
00506         std::vector<boost::shared_ptr<Chunk> >::const_iterator at = lookup.begin();
00507         const std::vector<boost::shared_ptr<Chunk> >::const_iterator end = lookup.end();
00508 
00509         while ( at != end ) {
00510             *result = **at++;
00511 
00512             if( copy_metadata )
00513                 result->join( *this );
00514 
00515             result++;
00516         }
00517     }

00557     template <typename TYPE> size_t foreachVoxel( VoxelOp<TYPE> &op ) {
00558         class _proxy: public ChunkOp
00559         {
00560             VoxelOp<TYPE> &op;
00561         public:
00562             _proxy( VoxelOp<TYPE> &_op ): op( _op ) {}
00563             bool operator()( Chunk &ch, util::FixedVector<size_t, 4 > posInImage ) {
00564                 return ch.foreachVoxel<TYPE>( op, posInImage ) == 0;
00565             }
00566         };
00567         _proxy prx( op );
00568         return convertToType( data::ValuePtr<TYPE>::staticID ) && foreachChunk( prx, false );
00569     }

00588 template<typename T> class TypedImage: public Image
00589 {
00590 protected:
00591     TypedImage() {} // to be used only by inheriting classes
00592 public:
00594     TypedImage( const Image &src ): Image( src ) { // ok we just copied the whole image
00595         //but we want it to be of type T
00596         convertToType( ValuePtr<T>::staticID );
00597     }
00599     TypedImage &operator=( const TypedImage &ref ) { //its already of the given type - so just copy it
00600         Image::operator=( ref );
00601         return *this;
00602     }
00604     TypedImage &operator=( const Image &ref ) { // copy the image, and make sure its of the given type
00605         Image::operator=( ref );
00606         convertToType( ValuePtr<T>::staticID );
00607         return *this;
00608     }
00609     void copyToMem( void *dst ) {
00610         Image::copyToMem<T>( ( T * )dst );
00611     }
00612     void copyToMem( void *dst )const {
00613         Image::copyToMem<T>( ( T * )dst );
00614     }
00615 };
00616 
00621 template<typename T> class MemImage: public TypedImage<T>
00622 {
00623 public:
00629     MemImage( const Image &src ) {
00630         operator=( src );
00631     }
00632 
00638     MemImage &operator=( const Image &ref ) { // copy the image, and make sure its of the given type
00639 
00640         Image::operator=( ref ); // ok we just copied the whole image
00641 
00642         //we want deep copies of the chunks, and we want them to be of type T
00643         struct : _internal::SortedChunkList::chunkPtrOperator {
00644             std::pair<util::ValueReference, util::ValueReference> scale;
00645             boost::shared_ptr<Chunk> operator()( const boost::shared_ptr< Chunk >& ptr ) {
00646                 return boost::shared_ptr<Chunk>( new MemChunk<T>( *ptr, scale ) );
00647             }
00648         } conv_op;
00649         conv_op.scale = ref.getScalingTo( ValuePtr<T>::staticID );
00650         LOG( Debug, info ) << "Computed scaling for conversion from source image: [" << conv_op.scale << "]";
00651 
00652         this->set.transform( conv_op );
00653 
00654         if( ref.isClean() ) {
00655             this->lookup = this->set.getLookup(); // the lookup table still points to the old chunks
00656         } else {
00657             LOG( Debug, info ) << "Copied unclean image. Running reIndex on the copy.";
00658             this->reIndex();
00659         }
00660 
00661         return *this;
00662     }
00663 };
